boco.newSql: SELECT TASK.*, MAIN.REVERT, MAIN.PERALLOCATEDUSER, MAIN.MAINALARMSOLVEDATE, MAIN.MAINCHECKSTATUS, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTWO, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTHREE, MAIN.MAINFAULTRESPONSELEVEL, MAIN.MAINNETSORTONE, MAIN.MAINNETNAME FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK TASK, COMMONFAULT_MAIN MAIN, COMMONFAULT_link LINK WHERE MAIN.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 AND MAIN.ID = TASK.SHEETKEY AND TASK.TASKDISPLAYNAME <> '²Ý¸å' AND MAIN.DELETED <> '1' AND MAIN.STATUS = 0 AND task.taskname='FirstExcuteHumTask' AND MAIN.ID=LINK.mainid(+) AND LINK.operatetype(+)=4 AND LINK.ID IS NULL AND (MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION = '3' OR MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION IS NULL) AND DECODE(MAIN.IFAGENT, '', '1', MAIN.IFAGENT) = 1 AND TASK.ID IN (SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND R.SUBROLEID = T3.TASKOWNER AND R.USERID = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND T1.TASKOWNER = R.SUBROLEID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND R.USERID = '$userId$') ORDER BY TASK.CREATETIME DESC
boco.T2Sql: SELECT TASK.*, MAIN.REVERT, MAIN.PERALLOCATEDUSER, MAIN.MAINALARMSOLVEDATE, MAIN.MAINCHECKSTATUS, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTWO, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTHREE, MAIN.MAINFAULTRESPONSELEVEL, MAIN.MAINNETSORTONE, MAIN.MAINNETNAME FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK TASK, COMMONFAULT_MAIN MAIN ,(SELECT m.ID,max(l.operatetime)operatetime FROM COMMONFAULT_MAIN M, COMMONFAULT_link L WHERE M.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 AND M.ID=L.mainid AND L.Operatetype=4 group by m.id,operatetype)t WHERE MAIN.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 and main.mainIsOther is null AND MAIN.ID = TASK.SHEETKEY AND TASK.TASKDISPLAYNAME <> '²Ý¸å' AND MAIN.DELETED <> '1' AND MAIN.STATUS = 0 AND task.taskname='FirstExcuteHumTask' AND MAIN.id=t.ID AND (MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION = '3' OR MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION IS NULL) AND DECODE(MAIN.IFAGENT, '', '1', MAIN.IFAGENT) = 1 AND TASK.ID IN (SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND R.SUBROLEID = T3.TASKOWNER AND R.USERID = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND T1.TASKOWNER = R.SUBROLEID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND R.USERID = '$userId$') ORDER BY TASK.CREATETIME DESC
boco.hold: SELECT TASK.*, MAIN.REVERT, MAIN.PERALLOCATEDUSER, MAIN.MAINALARMSOLVEDATE, MAIN.MAINCHECKSTATUS, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTWO, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTHREE, MAIN.MAINFAULTRESPONSELEVEL, MAIN.MAINNETSORTONE, MAIN.MAINNETNAME FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK TASK, COMMONFAULT_MAIN MAIN, COMMONFAULT_link LINK WHERE MAIN.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 AND MAIN.ID = TASK.SHEETKEY AND TASK.TASKDISPLAYNAME <> '²Ý¸å' AND MAIN.DELETED <> '1' AND MAIN.STATUS = 0 AND task.taskname='HoldHumTask' AND MAIN.ID=LINK.mainid(+) AND LINK.operatetype(+)=4 AND LINK.ID IS NULL AND (MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION = '3' OR MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION IS NULL) AND DECODE(MAIN.IFAGENT, '', '1', MAIN.IFAGENT) = 1 AND TASK.ID IN (SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND R.SUBROLEID = T3.TASKOWNER AND R.USERID = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND T1.TASKOWNER = R.SUBROLEID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND R.USERID = '$userId$') ORDER BY TASK.CREATETIME DESC
boco.reply: SELECT TASK.*, MAIN.REVERT, MAIN.PERALLOCATEDUSER, MAIN.MAINALARMSOLVEDATE, MAIN.MAINCHECKSTATUS, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTWO, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTHREE, MAIN.MAINFAULTRESPONSELEVEL, MAIN.MAINNETSORTONE, MAIN.MAINNETNAME FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK TASK, COMMONFAULT_MAIN MAIN, COMMONFAULT_link LINK WHERE MAIN.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 AND MAIN.ID = TASK.SHEETKEY AND TASK.TASKDISPLAYNAME <> '²Ý¸å' AND MAIN.DELETED <> '1' AND MAIN.STATUS = 0 AND task.taskname='reply' AND MAIN.ID=LINK.mainid(+) AND LINK.operatetype(+)=4 AND LINK.ID IS NULL AND (MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION = '3' OR MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION IS NULL) AND DECODE(MAIN.IFAGENT, '', '1', MAIN.IFAGENT) = 1 AND TASK.ID IN (SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND R.SUBROLEID = T3.TASKOWNER AND R.USERID = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND T1.TASKOWNER = R.SUBROLEID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND R.USERID = '$userId$') ORDER BY TASK.CREATETIME DESC
boco.cityreject: SELECT TASK.*, MAIN.REVERT, MAIN.PERALLOCATEDUSER, MAIN.MAINALARMSOLVEDATE, MAIN.MAINCHECKSTATUS, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTWO, MAIN.MAINNETSORTTHREE, MAIN.MAINFAULTRESPONSELEVEL, MAIN.MAINNETSORTONE, MAIN.MAINNETNAME FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK TASK, COMMONFAULT_MAIN MAIN ,(SELECT m.ID,max(l.operatetime)operatetime FROM COMMONFAULT_MAIN M, COMMONFAULT_link L WHERE M.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 AND M.ID=L.mainid AND L.Operatetype=4 group by m.id,operatetype)t WHERE MAIN.SENDTIME > SYSDATE - 30 and main.mainIsOther = '1' AND MAIN.ID = TASK.SHEETKEY AND TASK.TASKDISPLAYNAME <> '²Ý¸å' AND MAIN.DELETED <> '1' AND MAIN.STATUS = 0 AND task.taskname='FirstExcuteHumTask' AND MAIN.id=t.ID AND (MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION = '3' OR MAIN.NETOPTIMIZATION IS NULL) AND DECODE(MAIN.IFAGENT, '', '1', MAIN.IFAGENT) = 1 AND TASK.ID IN (SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2 WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T3.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T3, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M2, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'false' AND T3.SHEETKEY = M2.ID AND M2.STATUS = 0 AND M2.DELETED <> '1' AND R.SUBROLEID = T3.TASKOWNER AND R.USERID = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$userId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1 WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND T1.TASKOWNER = '$deptId$' UNION ALL SELECT T1.ID FROM COMMONFAULT_TASK T1, COMMONFAULT_TASK T2, COMMONFAULT_MAIN M1, TAW_SYSTEM_USERREFROLE R WHERE T1.IFWAITFORSUBTASK = 'true' AND T1.TASKSTATUS IN ('2', '8') AND T1.ID = T2.PARENTTASKID AND T2.TASKSTATUS = 5 AND T2.SUBTASKDEALFALG IS NULL AND T1.SHEETKEY = M1.ID AND T1.TASKOWNER = R.SUBROLEID AND M1.STATUS = 0 AND M1.DELETED <> '1' AND R.USERID = '$userId$') ORDER BY TASK.CREATETIME DESC
